description.lang: This smart dimmer plug in switch in a transceiver which is a Z-Wave enabled device and is fully compatible with any Z-Wave enabled network. Z-Wave enabled devices displaying the Z-Wave logo can also be use with it regardless of the manufacturer. And ours can also be used in other manufacturer's Z-Wave enabled networks. Remote on/off and dimming control of the connected load is possible with other manufacturer's wireless controller. Each switch is degined to act as a repeater. Repeaters will re-transmit the RF signal to ensure the signal is received by its intended destination by routing the signal around obstacles and radio dead spots.
This dimmer plug in switch can be asscoiated by 5 devices

name.lang: Change the state of indicator light

description.lang: Default status of socketLED is on as indicatorwhen the load is off
0 means night light mode ,1 means night light off
Default with memory: thesocket status is same asbefore when power on
0 means no memory function, 1 means memory function
